message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $7000. I can do $8500, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $7500?
I'm willing to meet you at $7500, but I was thinking we could do a bit better than that. How about $8000, and I'll throw in a small bonus?
